RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $3,850 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THERE GOES MY HERO broke sharply and tracked the leader into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, rallied from along the inside entering the final turn, battled for the lead into the stretch from the inside of DEANARROW, and prevailed over that rival in the closing stride in a determined effort. DEANARROW tracked the pacesetter into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied three wide entering the final turn, battled for the lead from the outside of THERE GOES MY HERO entering the lane, and continued with a stretch long battle to just miss. BECKAS BOY unhurried early while dropping back to trail, rallied smartly from along the inside entering the final turn, shifted three wide entering the lane, and closed willingly to get up for a share. THREE DAY BENDER away well and raced to the lead from just off the rail entering the first turn, dictated the pace in the run down the backside and into the final turn while one out from the rail, but was quickly overtaken leaving the turn, and weakened in the late going. SHOWMAN away alertly, and dropped into a stalking trip while racing three wide into the first turn, continued with a wide trip throughout, and failed to respond when called upon.

ENTRY.NAME: Three Day Bender
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, led rail, rallied 2 wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: There Goes My Hero
ENTRY.OWNER: Klimes Helen McDonald Jo-Anne and Pring Sharon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked inside, rallied rail, closed rail, prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Deanarrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 2 wide, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Showman
ENTRY.OWNER: Barroby Harold J and Barroby Mrs Harold J
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, stalked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Beckas Boy
ENTRY.OWNER: Barroby Harold J and Barroby Mrs Harold J
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, closed 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12500. (PLUS UP TO $4,375 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8 ,000, For Each $1,000 To $6,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILK STILETTOS away alertly and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, controlled the pace in the run down the backstretch, opened a clear advantage through the final turn, and continued to widen her advantage through the lane under confident handling. MISS THE HYPE broke sharply and tracked the leader into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, forced the issue two wide approaching the final turn, was unable to match strides with the pacesetter entering the turn, but battled willingly one out from the rail in the drive to hold the place. COCORITA stalked the early pace while racing two out from the rail entering the backstretch, rallied smartly two wide through the final turn, and closed willingly three wide in the drive to prove best of the rest. DANCING WITH LIL unhurried early after breaking well, and trailed the field in the run down the backside, rallied along the inside entering the final turn, but failed to make a late impact. THESKYISTHELIMIT rushed up three wide entering the backstretch to assume a tracking trip, continued three wide into the final turn, but faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Stilettos
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, widened

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing With Lil
ENTRY.OWNER: Tod Mountain Thoroughbreds and Redekop James
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Miss the Hype
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Cocorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Theskyisthelimit
ENTRY.OWNER: Dreamtime Stable Clark Heather and Beneen Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3 wide, rallied 3 wide, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 14000. (PLUS UP TO $4,900 THRIF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 13 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pric e $16,000, For Each $1,750 To $12,500 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $20,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHAMRA broke sharply and steadied sharply from between rivals entering the first turn, before dropping into a stalking trip entering the backstretch, rallied smartly two wide entering the final turn, tipped three wide leaving the turn and quickly overtook KAY'S KITCHEN in mid stretch and drew clear late as much the best. AMANDA settled off the contested early pace while racing just out from the rail entering the backside, rallied two out from the rail entering the final turn, and closed determinedly three wide in the drive to finish on even terms with KAY'S KITCHEN for the place. KAY'S KITCHEN away well and dueled for the lead from the outside of TAM TRICKY entering the first turn, continued to force the issue from the outside of that rival in the run down the backside and through the final turn, assumed command entering the lane, was no match when collared by SHAMRA in mid stretch, and finished from along the rail in the drive to end up on even terms with AMANDA. INDYGOGOLD unhurried early while dropping back to trail, commenced her bid three out from the rail entering the final turn, and found her best stride late while finishing three wide in the drive. TAM TRICKY away alertly and vied for the early lead from along the rail entering the first turn, set a pressured pace in the run down the backside and through the final turn from the inside of KAY'S KITCHEN, was unable to keep tabs on her pace rival leaving the turn, and weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Tam Tricky
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied rail, rallied rail, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Amanda
ENTRY.OWNER: Anderson, Dr. Bryan C. and Carol
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Indygogold
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied 4 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Shamra
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, stalked 3w, rallied 2w, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Kay's Kitchen
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled 2w, rallied 2w, closed rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13000. (PLUS UP TO $4,350 THRIF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 1 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, For Each $1,250 To $10,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $15,000. g Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY FORCE away well and dueled for the lead from the outside of REMEMBERTHEALAMO entering the first turn, disposed of his pace rival mid way down the backside and quickly opened up a clear advantage, widened that margin through the final turn while being kept to task, and continued to widen his advantage late as much the best. FILLY FATALE broke sharply and tracked the leaders into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, commenced her bid two wide entering the final turn, and closed willingly two wide in the drive to prove second best. SILARONE settled well off the contested early pace while saving ground at the rail entering the backside, launched his bid from along the inside entering the final turn, shifted three wide leaving the turn, and closed three wide in the drive to garner a share. TEX TONIC drifted five wide entering the first turn and dropped back to trail entering the backstretch while continuing with a wide trip, rallied two out from the rail entering the final turn, and finished five wide in the drive with late interest. STOPSHOPPINGSHELLY settled well off the early pace while racing one out from the rail in the run down the backside, rallied two wide through the final turn, but needed more when called upon. REMEMBERTHEALAMO away alertly and vied for the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, was unable to match strides with LUCKY FORCE mid way down the backstretch, and faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberthealamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, vied rail, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Silarone
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled rail, rallied inside, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Force
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, dueled 2 wide, led, drew off, handily

ENTRY.NAME: Filly Fatale
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Tex Tonic
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 6 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 5 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Stopshoppingshelly
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, needed more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 13 Allowed 4 lbs. (Maiden, Claiming, And Starter Races Not Considered For Allowances) (Pre ference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WE B THREE hopped at the start to get away slowly, and settled at the back of a compact field entering the backside, rallied two wide from between rival through the final turn, collared SOLARITY soon after entering the lane, and inched clear of that rival late to prove best. SOLARITY broke sharply and stalked the leader into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail, collared the pacesetter while mounting a two wide bid entering the final turn, assumed command entering the lane, but was no match when tackled by WE B THREE in mid stretch, but finished gamely to prove second best. RUN LOLA RUN away well and stalked the pacesetter into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied smartly three wide entering the final turn, and finished evenly two out from the rail in the drive to garner a share. BELCARRA PARK away alertly and sprinted to a clear lead through the first turn and into the backstretch, dictated the pace in the run to the final turn, was collared by rivals entering the final turn, and faded over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Solarity
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, stalked rail, rallied 2 wide, led, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: We B Three
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, settled 2w, rallied 2w, closed 3w, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Belcarra Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, clear lead, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Run Lola Run
ENTRY.OWNER: Gilbert George Gilbert Donna Potozny Larry and Godart Maria
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked 2 wide, rallied 3 wide, closed 3 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 11000. (PLUS UP TO $3,850 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, For Each $500 To $3,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUST MISTY hesitated at the start to get away slowly, and shifted in towards the rail while being chased away from the gate, angled four wide in the run to the first turn to gain a tracking trip entering the backstretch, forced the issue from the outside of BETTER WITH TIME entering the final turn and quickly assumed command, and proved to good. DRILL BABY DRILL away alertly and was allowed to settle off the early leaders while racing one out from the rail entering the backstretch, commenced her bid two wide entering the final turn, and closed three wide in the drive to get up for the place. BETTER WITH TIME broke sharply and raced to the lead from along the rail entering the first turn, dictated the pace in the run down the backstretch, was no match when tackled by JUST MISTY entering the final turn, but battled on gamely from along the rail to garner a share. OKANAGAN GOLD away well and stalked the leaders into the backstretch while saving ground at the rail in the run down the backside, continued to save ground through the final turn, and finished evenly from along the inside in the lane. BEST ONE YET unhurried early while dropping back to trail, rallied from along the inside entering the final turn, and finished three wide in the drive while unable to make a serious late impact. CLASSY LEGACY settled well off the leaders while racing two out from the rail entering the backside, dropped back to trail in the run to the final turn, and was being eased over the final furlong.

ENTRY.NAME: Drill Baby Drill
ENTRY.OWNER: Danard Don B and Snow Mel
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, settled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Okanagan Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, stalked rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Classy Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide, through early, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Best One Yet
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, trailed, rallied inside, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Misty
ENTRY.OWNER: Claggett Edwin MacPherson Craig and Armstrong Foster
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated start, tracked 2w, rallied 2w, led, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Better With Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led rail, rallied inside, closed rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HASTINGS RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. (PLUS UP TO $4,200 THRIF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, For Each $1,250 To $10,000 2 lbs. British Columbia Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ISLAND LIVING away well and tracked the pacesetter two out from the rail entering the backstretch, took up the chase two wide approaching the final turn, took the narrowest of advantages into the lane, and inched clear in the closing strides to prevail. LILSISTERLEE away alertly and cleared the field in the run to the first turn to assume command, controlled the pace from along the rail in the run down the backstretch, battled through the final turn from the inside of ISLAND LIVING, was overtaken entering the lane, but battled back gamely from along the rail in the lane in a valiant effort. SHESBOURBONONICE broke sharply and tracked the leader into the backstretch while racing one out from the rail, rallied smartly from along the rail through the final turn, tipped three wide entering the lane, and closed determinedly to get up for a share. STAR FINALITY was off a step slow and was squeezed between rivals to get away poorly, chased three wide into the first turn to gain a striking position while settling off the early pace, rallied with interest three out from the rail through the final turn, but hung late while unable to overcome her troubled beginning, and finished on even terms with PRINCESS HANNA. PRINCESS HANNA settled off the early pace while racing one out from the rail entering the final turn, rallied two wide entering the final turn, and finished from along the inside in the stretch drive to finish on even terms with STAR FINALITY. STOLO SPIRIT was fractious prior to the start, was devoid of early speed while trailing the field into the first turn, was always well back and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Stolo Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Star Finality
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed break, squeezed, settled 3w, rallied 3w, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Princess Hanna
ENTRY.OWNER: Danard Don B and Danard Sue
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 2 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed inside

ENTRY.NAME: Shesbourbononice
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, tracked 2 wide, rallied inside, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Island Living
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well, tracked 3 wide, rallied 2 wide, closed 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Lilsisterlee
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, led rail, rallied inside, closed 2 wide, grudgingly
